name: The Last Carrot (DawnDev)
description:
A Couch Competitive Game of Keepaway. Up too 4 players fight over a single carrot. The carrot spawns in the middle and is able to be brought to any of 4 growing beds to grow. Once it is fully grown, the player who picks it up first wins. Fight to ensure that player is you. 

Players: 1-4

4 Reccomended Controller Required, Prefferably XBox. 

Controls A: Spawn In X: Grab and drop carrot RT: Shoot LT: Dash Left Stick: Move Right Stick: Aim
